frame.name: Assigned_location
frame.definition:
<def-root>An Individual is assigned a <fen>Station</fen> to remain at, usually in order to accomplish a task. The <fen>Station</fen> may have an intended use based on its features (e.g., a vendor's booth), or it may be temporarily assigned a use.
<ex>The guards who remained at their <t>stations</t> had no idea what was going on two floors below.</ex>
<ex>Return to your <t>post</t>!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Station
FE.definition:
<def-root>The locale where the Entity is supposed to be.
It is typically the designation of the nouns of Locale-derived frames.
<ex>Get back to your <t>station</t>, soldier!.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Relative_location
FE.definition:
<def-root>A place that the <fen>Station</fen> is located with respect to.
<ex>The <t>post</t> <fex name="rel">by the main entrance</fex> was the least desirable assignment.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Formational_cause
FE.definition: <def-root>Indicates the action (or causer) which brings the features of the <fen>Station</fen> about. This FE also covers expressions that indicate that there was no salient formation.</def-root>

FE.name: Container_possessor
FE.definition: <def-root>The location that the <fen>Station</fen> is a part of. <ex>Most of <fex name="ContP">the fort's</fex> <t>stations</t> are manned by two individuals ata time.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>The Descriptor is a temporary condition of the <fen>Station</fen>.
<ex>Why did she always get assigned to the <fex name="des">dirtiest</fex> <t>post</t> in the park?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Related_event
FE.definition: <def-root>An event related to the <fen>Station</fen> in some way other than (1) Formational_cause (which is a separate FE) or an intended use (which would place the instance in Locale_by_use), or (3) a defining event (which would place the instance in Locale_by_event).</def-root>

FE.name: Task
FE.definition:
<def-root>The activity that is carried out at the <fen>Station</fen>.
<ex>This will be your <fex name="use">firing</fex> <t>station</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Responsible_party
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Responsible_party</fen> is tasked with remaining at the <fen>Station</fen> to perform a <fen>Task</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: station.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: where one is assigned to be, especially to guard or protect.

lexUnit.name: place.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the designated location of an individual or group.

lexUnit.name: station.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to assign a station to, or place in a station/position
